product_name: Toko Basic Hot Wax Kit for Downhill Skis - Special Buy
long_description: The Toko Basic Hot Wax Kit for downhill skis includes waxes that cover 3 separate temperature ranges, an all-purpose nylon brush and a 3mm plexiscraper. 40g of Toko Non Fluro Yellow wax works well from air temperatures ranging from 50degF to 25degF (10degC to -4degC). 40g of Toko Non Fluro Red wax works well from air temperatures ranging from 28degF to 12degF (-2degC to -11degC). 40g Toko Non Fluro Blue wax works well from air temperatures ranging from 16degF to -22degF (-9degC to -30degC). The Toko Basic Hot Wax Kit for downhill skis includes a storage bag. Special buy.
short_description: The Toko Basic Hot Wax Kit for downhill skis includes waxes that cover 3 separate temperature ranges, an all-purpose nylon brush and a 3mm plexiscraper.
